articles.title: Target looks to massive solar panels in a California parking lot as a green model to power its stores - CNBC
articles.description: One of the retailer's California locations will become its most sustainable store and it may be turned into a new model to power locations across the country.
articles.content:
Target has rolled out one of the most visible displays of its efforts to become a greener company: Massive carports topped with solar panels that will power a big-box store in California.
The panels… [+4493 chars]
